scripts.minify: npm run minify-npm && npm run minify-browser
scripts.minify-npm: node_modules/.bin/babel lib/index.js -o lib/index.min.js && node_modules/.bin/babel-minify lib/index.min.js -o lib/index.min.js
scripts.minify-browser: node_modules/.bin/babel browser/index.js -o browser/index.min.js && node_modules/.bin/babel-minify browser/index.min.js -o browser/index.min.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run minify
